casebody.data:
Friday, December 1, 2000

MISCELLANEOUS DISMISSALS

00-2131. State ex rel. Ruff v. Court of Appeals, First App. Dist. of Ohio.

In Mandamus. On November 27, 2000, relator filed a complaint in mandamus. Whereas the complaint does not include the affidavit in support of the complaint as required by S.Ct.Prac.R. X(4),

IT IS ORDERED by the court, sua sponte, that this case be, and hereby is, dismissed.
